category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_allow_signoff_assignment_to_OOO_user
preference.preference_description: Controls the task assignment of a signoff when the delegate is already a member of the signoff team. Valid Values: * true: Assigns the signoff to the out-of-office user because the delegate is already a member of signoff team. * false: Assigns the signoff to the resource pool belonging to the out-of-office user. This is the default value.
